name: Baby Dragon Hat [1]

name: Backpack
description: A backpack that can be loaded with anything. You can still move freely when carrying a loaded backpack.

description: Ever since their homeland was destroyed by nuclear weapons, the highly intelligent Baltan have embarked on endless journeys. Try to be friendly to them.

name: Banana
description: A sweet fruit that can restore 17-21 points of HP.

name: Banana Juice
description: Fruit juice squeezed from bananas. It can restore 26-34 points of HP, and the effect is faster than that of direct eating.
